page.title: 04STUD
page.content: {RICHMOND STUD AND FARM}HAS FIFTEEN HORSES AND IS IN BARNS GREEN.THERE ARE THREE PEOPLE RUNNING IT AND THEIR NAMES ARE DEBBIE,KIMBERLY AND TERRI.THEY HAVE BEEN THERE TEN MONTHS AND ARE ENJOYING IT VERY MUCH.IT IS NOT A RIDING SCHOOL BUT YOU CAN HAVE PRIVATE LESSONS.THEY HAVE GOT FOUR STALLIONS AND THEIR NAMES ARE MOZART,COMET,INVADER AND DRAGON.I LIKE DRAGON THE BEST BECAUSE HE IS ONLY TWELVE HANDS HIGH.THE HORSES GRAZE ON ABOUT EIGHT ACRES AND THAT IS REALLY FOR FIFTEEN HORSES.THEY SPEACILISE IN DRESSAGE WHICH IS TESTING RIDERS SKILLS.
